T.Rex Live Series  Lincoln 1971  - The Official Marc Bolan Merch Co.|Skip to content|shop@officialmarcbolanmerchco.com|My Account|Register|All Categories|Books|Boxed Sets|BUNDLE OFFERS|CD Live Mail order only Series|CD's|Clothing|Clothing > TOUR SHIRTS / Concert Shirt|Clothing > Womens Fit  Items|Clothing > XXXL Items|Clothing Sweatshirts|Coffee Mugs|Coming Soon|Gallery|Gifts|Gifts   LIMITED EDITION PRINTS ON ART PAPER|Gifts - Deluxe A5 Greetings cards|GIFTS >   Brochure- Programmes|Gifts >Posters & Ltd Prints|Gifts BADGES|GIFTS STICKERS|Hooded Tops Heavy Weight|MAIL ORDER ONLY ITEM|MUSIC|New Releases|Photographs   10"x8"|Record Deck Slipmats|T-Shirts|Tote Bags|Vest Tops|Vinyl|Vinyl    7" Singles & E.P s|0|£0.00|Home|Gifts|Music|Clothing|New Releases|Coming Soon|T.Rex Live Series    Lincoln 1971|T.Rex Live Series    Lincoln 1971|Categories:|CD Live Mail order only Series|,|CD's|,|MAIL ORDER ONLY ITEM|,|New Releases|£|7.99|T.Rex Live Series    Lincoln 1971 quantity|— OR —|Add to basket|SKU:|BLNS019|Description|Additional information|Reviews (0)|Description|Every once in a while something comes along and knocks you off your feet ..to say that any recordings from the 1971 Warriors Tour are as rare as hens teeth .. when this lady Helen contacted me to say that she had a tape of Lincoln recorded by her Mum ..i tried not to get too excited as I ( unfairly ) imagined it to be pretty rough . The only other recording we have from this tour is Newcatle  which was a challenge to rescue . The story of Lincoln may have come to an abrupt end there …as i played it on my Tape to PC  machine and it was indeed very muffled and almost unlistenable ….i was deflated but not surprised .. i sent Helen the file and she came right back to me saying ‘hold on i listened to it recently and its no way near as bad as this !’  My machine was clearly up the swanny.. so with a new feeling of hope i sent the cassette to londons FX copyroom to bake the tape and transfer the recording to wav files . This then went to Anders in Sweden to clean and pull up as much as was there   he did manage to improve the sound even more … This is an audience recording  with chat by the girls  sweet wrappers  being opened  etc   but the show is really quite good and a fantastic document from this tour !  as an added bonus ( I think !)  is that Helens mum didnt turn the tape off as she left the ABC to come out into the winter evening surrounded by the dodgy poster sellers surroundiung the young fans ……so i kept it in . I cant thank Helen and her mum enough
